transcript: if you've ever seen Ray Dalia the guy's worth whatever 20 or $30 billion now he's hopping on podcasts with people who aren't worth a thousandth of his net worth because they have something that he doesn't they have distribution they have attention they have media they have a platform and so you can build a platform of any kind of genre and if you have enough people you have enough eyeballs you will be able to gain access to people far above you by inviting them to exchange with them something that you have that they do not which is distribution of a message and so that is one way that you can get someone way out of your league to come into your world
